token.label.request_quantity_limit_descr: Set the maximum API call times that this Token can request per month. The system will reset this count at the beginning of each natural month. No input means 'unlimited' API requests.
token.placeholder.ip_whitelist: Please enter, multiple IP addresses are separated by , or ;
token.tip.delete_token: After deletion, the Token client cannot request the interface, and cannot be recovered after deletion. Are you sure you want to delete this Token?
token.tip.ip_whitelist_validate: {1} does not conform to IP address format
token.title.token_save_tip: Please save this Token in a safe and easily accessible place. For security reasons, you will not be able to view it again through the Token management interface. If you lose this Token, you will need to re-create it.
